TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit WebAppAuthenticationBuilderExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Extensions for AuthenticationBuilder for startup initialization.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationBuilder AddSignIn (this Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationBuilder builder, Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration configuration, string configSectionName = "AzureAd", string openIdConnectScheme = "OpenIdConnect", string cookieScheme = "Cookies", bool subscribeToOpenIdConnectMiddlewareDiagnosticsEvents = false);

.method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationBuilder AddSignIn(class Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationBuilder builder, class Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration configuration, string configSectionName, string openIdConnectScheme, string cookieScheme, bool subscribeToOpenIdConnectMiddlewareDiagnosticsEvents) cil managed

<Extension()> Public Function AddSignIn (builder As AuthenticationBuilder, configuration As IConfiguration, Optional configSectionName As String = "AzureAd", Optional openIdConnectScheme As String = "OpenIdConnect", Optional cookieScheme As String = "Cookies", Optional subscribeToOpenIdConnectMiddlewareDiagnosticsEvents As Boolean = false) As AuthenticationBuilder

static member AddSignIn : Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationBuilder * Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration * string * string * string * bool -> Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationBuilder

Docs.param: AuthenticationBuilder to which to add this configuration.
The configuration section with the necessary settings to initialize authentication options.
The OpenIdConnect scheme name to be used. By default it uses "OpenIdConnect".
The Cookies scheme name to be used. By default it uses "Cookies".
Set to true if you want to debug, or just understand the OpenIdConnect events.
Docs.summary: Add authentication with Microsoft identity platform. This method expects the configuration file will have a section, named "AzureAd" as default, with the necessary settings to initialize authentication options.

MemberSignature.Value: public static Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationBuilder AddSignIn (this Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationBuilder builder, Action<Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.OpenIdConnect.OpenIdConnectOptions> configureOpenIdConnectOptions, Action<Microsoft.Identity.Web.MicrosoftIdentityOptions> configureMicrosoftIdentityOptions, string openIdConnectScheme = "OpenIdConnect", string cookieScheme = "Cookies", bool subscribeToOpenIdConnectMiddlewareDiagnosticsEvents = false);

<Extension()> Public Function AddSignIn (builder As AuthenticationBuilder, configureOpenIdConnectOptions As Action(Of OpenIdConnectOptions), configureMicrosoftIdentityOptions As Action(Of MicrosoftIdentityOptions), Optional openIdConnectScheme As String = "OpenIdConnect", Optional cookieScheme As String = "Cookies", Optional subscribeToOpenIdConnectMiddlewareDiagnosticsEvents As Boolean = false) As AuthenticationBuilder

static member AddSignIn : Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationBuilder * Action<Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.OpenIdConnect.OpenIdConnectOptions> * Action<Microsoft.Identity.Web.MicrosoftIdentityOptions> * string * string * bool -> Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.AuthenticationBuilder

Docs.param: AuthenticationBuilder to which to add this configuration.
The configuration section with the necessary settings to initialize authentication options.
The OpenIdConnect scheme name to be used. By default it uses "OpenIdConnect".
The Cookies scheme name to be used. By default it uses "Cookies".
Set to true if you want to debug, or just understand the OpenIdConnect events.
Docs.summary: Add authentication with Microsoft identity platform. This method expects the configuration file will have a section, named "AzureAd" as default, with the necessary settings to initialize authentication options.
